Unnamed: 1: A comprehensive guide to understanding e-commerce KPIs and financial metrics
1. START WITH ASSUMPTIONS: Review and adjust the blue-colored input values in the Assumptions sheet to match your expectations.
2. REVIEW SITE PROJECTIONS: Each site has its own sheet showing 12-month projections for traffic, revenue, and profitability.
3. CHECK CONSOLIDATED VIEW: See the portfolio-wide aggregated metrics and track overall performance.
4. MONITOR MONTHLY: Update actual figures against projections to track variance and adjust strategy.
5. COLOR CODING: Blue text = Editable inputs | Black text = Calculated values | Green text = Cross-sheet references
